description: Offers for automobile warranty, vehicle warranty extension or continuation.

Offer Origin.description: The type of company that originated the offers. For vehicle warranty extension offers, this is likely considered a Service Center

Service.description: The product or service being promoted in the text - this is likely an Extended Auto Warranty.

Offer Summary.description: A summary of the offer, limited to 10 words.  For an offer of extended vehicle warranty, the product could be simply: An extension to the vehicle warranty coverage.

Offer Close Date.description: When does the offer expire or end.

Warranty.description: If there is a warranty being offered, what is the most miles and most number of years.
